articles.description: New Leicester City manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says he was "astonished" by the amount of interest in him after his brief spell as Manchester United boss.
articles.title: Leicester City: Ruud van Nistelrooy "astonished" by offers after Manchester United spell

articles.description: McLaren call for an inquiry into the penalty Lando Norris was given for ignoring yellow flags during the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Qatar GP 2024: McLaren call for inquiry into Norris penalty

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains why it will be hard for anyone to catch Premier League leaders Liverpool following Sunday's win over Manchester City.
articles.title: 'Reds are the real deal' - why it will be hard to stop Liverpool now

articles.description: Seven Manchester City players are among 11 Premier League stars nominated for the 2024 Fifpro team of the year.
articles.title: Fifpro: Seven Manchester City players nominated for 2024 team of the year award

articles.description: A new logo for the men's Six Nations which aims to encapsulate the "electrifying action" of the tournament has attracted derision from many fans.
articles.title: Six Nations rebrand: Fans criticise new logo for 2025

articles.description: The father of Olympic 5,000m champion Jakob Ingebrigtsen will stand trial next year after being charged with alleged physical abuse against his son.
articles.title: Jakob Ingebrigtsen: Olympic champion's father Gjert charged with alleged with physical and mental abuse

articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur: How do Spurs solve their chronic inconsistency?

articles.description: As Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales prepare for their Euro 2025 play-off second legs, BBC Sport looks at their qualification paths.
articles.title: Euro 2025 play-offs: How to follow Wales, Scotland & Northern Ireland on BBC

articles.title: Guinea football crush kills dozens in Nzérékoré
